extendedInfo.description: RepliGo PDF Reader enables PDF viewing, annotating, printing and form filling. Review documents on the go by adding highlights, cross outs, underlines, sticky notes, arrows, lines, ovals, rectangles, freehand drawings and text boxes. Comments are stored as standard annotations in the original PDF file, just like AdobeÂ® AcrobatÂ®.RepliGo PDF Reader also makes a great eBook reader with features like reflowed text, color themes, text-to-speech and brightness settings.Detailed Features:* PDF viewing, annotating, printing and form filling of files from your email, memory card, cloud services and the Internet* Direct access to cloud-based PDF files stored in Box, Dropbox, Google Drive and Microsoft SkyDrive* Add highlights, cross outs, underlines, sticky notes, arrows, lines, ovals, rectangles, freehand drawings and text boxes* Adjust colors, border thickness, font size and the note for annotations* Read documents easily with reflowed text, text-to-speech, color themes and brightness settings* Scroll quickly through pages by swiping, tapping on the edge of the screen, or by using the volume keys* Navigate long documents using bookmarks, comments, document links, go to page, search and thumbnails* Click on email, map, phone and web hyperlinks to launch system applications* Zoom in and out quickly by pinching or double-tapping on columns, images or tables* Select text and copy it to the clipboard, or look up definitions using ColorDict* Rotate documents into one of four orientations* Open password protected files* Send PDF files via email, Bluetooth and cloud services* Galaxy Note II Multi Window support* Keyboard and trackball support

reviews.title: Best PDF reader, but...
reviews.comment: This is truly the best PDF reader for Android. But I would like to see one little thing in the next update and that\'s to be able to do \"two finger zoom while using the pen, and not have a mark on the pdf unless using a single stroke\"   Please, please make that happen!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: Love the smoothness and usability. Great multi window function on my Galaxy Note 8!  One feature id live to see would be to somehow keep the highlighter on to highlight multiple sections on the page without having to reopen the edit bar every time. But, really a wonderful app!
reviews.author: Sara Coenen

reviews.comment: Apart from sticky notes losing their (sometimes lengthy) comments, I\'m still very happy with the other annotation features. It well suits my needs for working with lecture and scanned notes on my tablet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Control over read aloud ?
reviews.comment: Would be great if you could start text to speech from a bookmark and choose to read body only rather than also headers and footers. If that is available plse advise.
reviews.author: Craig karlson

reviews.comment: Best I\'ve found or used, have thousands of PDFs, so a good reader is an absolute must and THIS IS AS GOOD AS IT GETS. However I annotate a lot and have not figured out a way to delete or edit them.
reviews.author: Rick Coates

reviews.title: Excellent PDF Reader with great annotation and navigation!!
Great
reviews.comment: Please, add support to \"s-pen over hand\" (pen edits, finger scroll/erases) and an eraser when free hand editing, so it can become my Galaxy Note 10.1 best friend!!! Plz plz plz!!
reviews.author: Bruno Jos\303\251 Palmeira de Araujo

reviews.title: Text Reflow mode better than any other PDF reader
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried most of the notable PDF viewer including Adobe, ezPDF, Moon Reader, etc. All these editors have text reflow. But RepliGo is the only one which displays the images properly in reflow mode.
reviews.author: AANAND NATARAJAN

reviews.title: Good reader
reviews.comment: This is a very solid pdf reader. I\'m an academic, so I like to be able to mark up my readings, and this does the trick \342\200\224 mostly. I wish it allowed me to underline scanned pdfs, even non-OCRed pdfs. My other complaint is that you can\'t hide system files. So since all of my pdfs came from my Mac, there\'s a duplicate that begins with a period. Thus I have to scroll through all of these duplicates before getting to the real files. Fix those two and it\'s a definite 5 stars! (A zoom slider would be nice too, so that you can zoom with the stylus only. And being able to scroll vertically continuous would be nice too.)  Edit: one more thing: I wish the vertical scrolling was continuous. I hate having to do a big swipe just to change pages.
reviews.author: Matt Getz

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: ...though I can\'t open a PDF directly from Chrome, Firefox, etc.
reviews.author: kris erickson

reviews.title: Getting better and faster with every updates.
reviews.comment: Amazing pdf reader, the last version is incredibly fast. Before this update,I was using another pdf reader for big files, I\'m happy I can do everything in no time,with only this one now. Really the best pdf reader so far.
reviews.author: Marc-Alexandre Mestres

reviews.title: The best pdf reader
reviews.comment: Really the best pdf reader I\'ve ever tried. You can read documents, you can read books - everything is just perfect.
reviews.author: molotx nickname

reviews.title: just the best
reviews.comment: u saved me, perfect reflow mechanism, many beautiful, functuional and appropriate options! ive bought thousand apps so far. this is one of the best, and compared with other pdf readers? thats just nonsense. my hat off to the dev. thanx
reviews.author: Jeyong Chang

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: I host seminars and have used this app for my sign in, so I always have a record of who attended. I also use it to sign documents to book the hotels and meeting space, all on my phone and Nook. Super handy for anyone on the go!
reviews.author: Erin Nelson

reviews.title: Does NOT autosave
reviews.comment: I love this program but in my doctoral exam studies I cannot lose my bookmarks and underlines because this software doesn\'t autosave. It needs to do it about every minute if it can\'t do it with every change. It can\'t be that difficult to implement. I just lost about an hour of reading markings because I ran out of battery. Please implement autosave. like EzPDF reader has. (that one is not perfect either, it just autosaves)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Above Average (would like to create shortcuts on desktop)
reviews.comment: Does text 2 speech (English) well (highlights \"not saving the highlights\" what is reading 2 you as it goes along). Can put notes inline (on the document rather than in a popup box). OCR conversion (for nonOCRer\'d pdfs) and converting to MS word would make five stars for me. Wasn\'t intuitive for me 2 highlight the text I wanted the app to read aloud if I didn\'t want the app to read the whole page, but figured it out. Would like flattened export option. Thanks. God bless. Aaron.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: Finally! A freaking PDF reader that just works! The only small complaint I have is that you can only view one page at a time (in other words, when scrolling from page to page, you can\'t have part of both pages showing on screen simultaneously). But this is really a very minor annoyance.  EDIT: A recent development is that on my TF700 the screen sort of wobbles back and forth briefly. This sometimes happens quite frequently (every few seconds). Often I can get it to stop by stopping and restarting the app. This only happens in Repligo and not in any other apps (even other apps for viewing PDFs).
reviews.author: Josh Levinson

reviews.comment: .I love this app it can read saved web pages or act like a book reader when reading files converted from the web it over looks \'sloppy\' formatting that will cause book reader not to display properly. Excelent all around all purpose work horse app with all the features you need.\tLove the update it made highlighting easy I used to have to fight to get a highlight many times. Now the program is consistantly easier. I know it has been a long time since the update but I was waiting for it to stop working well but it did not. The only annoying thing now is that I cant take ut firward part of a page to the beginning of a parageraph but I am getting used to that by now. and I can live easily enough with it.. Thanks For the great program.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great--much better than ezPDF
reviews.comment: I have had repligo pdf reader for several months. Recently, a friend urged me to try ezPDF and I can\'t tell you how underwhelmed I was by the experience.  ezPDF\'s only advantage is a more beautiful graphical effect when you turn the page--it looks like an Android e-book with a paper-book like effect.  But if you are doing annotations on a pdf file, trying to highlight or underline sections, repligo is so much better I couldn\'t believe it.  In ezPDf, it is literally impossible to mark and adjust the text you want to grab unless you have a stylus. On the other hand, repligo has the Android style range markers that are easy to adjust.   So, even though I bought ezPDF, I\'m back to repligo.  And if they\'d distribute a version for Linux operating systems, I\'d buy that too.   pj
reviews.author: Paul Johnson
